Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.application used by com.stormpath.sdk.application
AccountStoreMapping
          An AccountStoreMapping represents the assignment of an AccountStore (either a Group or Directory) to an Application.
AccountStoreMappingCriteria
          An AccountStoreMapping-specific Criteria class, enabling an AccountStoreMapping-specific fluentquery DSL.
AccountStoreMappingList
          A CollectionResource containing AccountStoreMapping instances.
AccountStoreMappingOptions
          AccountStoreMapping-specific options that may be specified when retrieving AccountStoreMapping resources.
Application
          An Application instance represents a Stormpath registered application.
ApplicationCriteria
          An Application-specific Criteria class, enabling an Application-specific fluentquery DSL.
ApplicationOptions
          Application-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Application resources.
ApplicationStatus
           
CreateApplicationRequest
          Represents an attempt to create a new Application record in Stormpath.
CreateApplicationRequestBuilder
          A Builder to construct CreateApplicationRequests.
 

Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.application used by com.stormpath.sdk.client
Application
          An Application instance represents a Stormpath registered application.

          An Application-specific Criteria class, enabling an Application-specific fluentquery DSL.

          Represents an attempt to create a new Application record in Stormpath.
